title: During Match Accept Screen Problems
body: Is it just me or does anyone else have a lag when a player rejects a game/refuses game because of whatever reason and you try to accept the replacement match it lags or refuses to let you accept the game. Really irritating when i keep getting queued for this continually happening.

replies.body: Your network might be having some problems transitioning between different services, like the matchmaking server, and that can cause issues.  Continuing to decline matches, even if unintentional, can result in a lower priority queue.  Try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this, and let me know if you have any questions!
still having problems with the system will continue to do this

That's weird, sorry to hear though.  :(  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if auto-configuring your firewall settings might help.

If not, the tool should collect some logs for you.  Attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help dig into this with you directly.
